title: dimensions
description: An object describing physical dimensions of the different optical elements and samples used for BRDF measurements.

length.title: length
length.description: Length of an optical element or sample used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the length of an optical element or sample as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the length of an optical element or sample as a string that can have values "pm", "nm", "μm", "mm", "dm", "m", "km", "Mm" or "Gm".

comments.title: comments
comments.description: The section that allows to provide any additional information regarding dimensions of the different optical elements and samples used for BRDF measurements as a text (i.e.string).

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the dimensions of the different optical elements and samples that cannot be presented within "dimensions" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries.
